Are these the moths

you said you caught

in Wales?

Yep, those are special moths

that you won’t

find here, where

we live.

I brought them

back so I could

study them more

closely.

What? You mean you

killed them just so you could collect them?

If our sister finds

out about this she

won’t be happy.

She believes that

all life is precious, even little bugs.

Oh, really?

23
